sensory_systems.name: Advanced Multi-Sensor Fusion
sensory_systems.description: Combines data from diverse sources – network traffic analysis, endpoint telemetry, threat intelligence feeds, vulnerability scanners, and user behavior analytics – using advanced AI algorithms to create a holistic security picture. Goes beyond simple correlation to identify complex attack chains.
sensory_systems.technology: Deep learning, Bayesian Networks, Kalman Filtering, Sensor Fusion Algorithms
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Attack Detection Rate: 95%+ (for known attacks), 70%+ (for novel attacks), False Positive Rate: <5%

sensory_systems.name: Passive Network Threat Detection (PNT)
sensory_systems.description: Real-time analysis of network packets without signature-based detection. Utilizes behavioral analytics to identify anomalous network activity indicative of attacks.
sensory_systems.technology: Deep Packet Inspection (DPI) with AI, Stateful Protocol Analysis, Machine Learning anomaly detection.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: False Positive Rate: <10%, Attack Detection Rate: 80%+ (for sophisticated attacks), Time to Detection: <5 seconds
research_areas: Secure Deep Learning for Network Traffic

sensory_systems.name: Biometric Threat Detection
sensory_systems.description: Leverages behavioral biometrics (keystroke dynamics, mouse movements, screen interactions) and physiological signals (heart rate variability, skin conductance) to identify compromised users or insider threats.
sensory_systems.technology: Real-time biometric data capture, AI-powered behavioral modeling, anomaly detection algorithms.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: User Identification Accuracy: 98%, Attack Detection Rate (for impersonation): 85%, False Positive Rate: <2%

control_systems.name: Autonomous Incident Response (AIR)
control_systems.description: Automated execution of pre-defined security workflows to contain and remediate threats. Includes automated blocking, quarantine, user account disabling, and system isolation.
control_systems.technology: Robotic Process Automation (RPA), Orchestration Platforms, AI-powered decision-making, Digital Twins
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Containment Time: <30 seconds, Remediation Success Rate: 90%, Operational Cost Reduction: 60-80%
research_areas: Secure AI Agents for Incident Response

control_systems.name: Adaptive Access Control
control_systems.description: Real-time adjustment of access permissions based on contextual factors – user behavior, device posture, threat intelligence, and business policies.
control_systems.technology: Zero Trust Architecture, Policy Engines, Identity and Access Management (IAM) Integration, Micro-segmentation.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Unauthorized Access Attempts Blocked: 98%, Policy Enforcement Rate: 100%, Scalability: 10,000+ users

mechanical_systems.name: Secure Hardware Enclaves
mechanical_systems.description: Isolated hardware environments for processing sensitive security data, providing a physical barrier against tampering and malware.
mechanical_systems.technology: Trusted Execution Environments (TEEs), Secure Processors, Hardware Root of Trust
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Not applicable (hardware-focused, metrics related to isolation and security integrity)

software_integration.name: Security Orchestration, Automation, and Response (SOAR) Platform 5.0
software_integration.description: Advanced SOAR platform integrating all security tools, providing a unified control plane for incident management, automation, and threat intelligence.
software_integration.technology: API-First Architecture, Machine Learning-Powered Automation, Blockchain-Based Audit Trails
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Platform Uptime: 99.999%, Automation Coverage: 80%+ of Security Processes

software_integration.name: Digital Twin for Security
software_integration.description: A dynamic virtual replica of the IT infrastructure, used for simulating attacks, testing security controls, and predicting vulnerabilities.
software_integration.technology: 3D Modeling, IoT Simulation, Real-time Data Streaming, AI-powered Scenario Generation.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Simulation Accuracy: 95%, Prediction Accuracy: 80%+ (for high-impact threats)
